Using GitHub Actions with Hugo to build this site

Making use of GitHub actions in combination with Hugo is a nice and easy way to build static web pages. The following resources helped in making this really easy:

  • GH actions by peaceiris
  • Hermit Template
  • Nice blog as baseline
